description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Appellee v. Christopher M. HENEGAR, Gunnery Sergeant (E-7), U.S. Marine Corps, Appellant
**판결일**: 2016-08-18
**법원**: Navy-Marine Corps Court of Criminal Appeals
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Colonel, Fulton, Lieutenant, Marks, Palmer, Robinson, Usmc

## 변호인

For Appellant: Lieutenant Colonel Richard A. Viczorek, USMCR., For Appellee: Lieutenant James M. Bel-fort!, JAGC, USN.

## 인용

- 75 M.J. 772

## 판결문 요약

          U NITED S TATES N AVY –M ARINE C ORPS
              C OURT OF C RIMINAL A PPEALS
                           _________________________

                               No. 201500379

                   UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
                                    Appellee
                                        v.
                    CHRISTOPHER M. HENEGAR
               Gunnery Sergeant (E-7), U.S. Marine Corps
                              Appellant
                       _________________________
 Appeal from the United States Navy-Marine Corps Trial Judiciary

   Military Judge: Lieutenant Colonel E. H. Robinson, Jr., USMC.
  For Appellant: Lieutenant Colonel Richard A. Viczorek , USMCR.
      For Appellee: Lieutenant James M. Belforti, JAGC, USN.
                       _________________________

                           Decided 18 August 2016
                           _________________________

   Before P ALMER , M ARKS , and F ULTON , Appellate Military Judges
                       _________________________

                 PUBLISHED OPINION OF THE COURT
                       _________________________

PALMER, Senior Judge:
    A military judge, sitting as a general court-martial, convicted the
appellant, pursuant to his pleas, of one specification1 each of attempted
sexual assault of a child, attempted wrongful distribution of a controlled
substance, and attempted sexual abuse of a child, in violation o...
